name: Masterpiece Ancient Defensive Bracer

items.alias: Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Spirit Combat Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Spirit Medical Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Spirit Technical Knowledge

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge" "267677" x 3 #L "Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge" "267679" x 3 #L "Inert Knowledge Crystal" "267737" x 3 #L "Crystalised Memories of a Sniper" "267704" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Warrior" "267697" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Doctor" "267726" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Surgeon" "267728" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Technician" "267698" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Mechanic" "267701" #L "Modified Ancient Combat Bracer" "267755" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Part 1: Crystalised Memories of a Sniper + Crystalised Memories of a Warrior = #L "Combined Crystalised Combat Memories" "267705" Skills: | NP1250 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge + Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge" "267680" Skills: | PT1750 | ------------------------------ Combined Crystalised Combat Memories + Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Combat Knowledge" "267681" Skills: | CL1250 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Combat Knowledge + Inert Knowledge Crystal = #L "Combat Knowledge Crystal" "267739" Skills: | CL1250 | ------------------------------ Part 2: Crystalised Memories of a Doctor + Crystalised Memories of a Surgeon = #L "Combined Crystalised Medical Memories" "267729" Skills: | CH1750 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge + Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge" "267680" Skills: | PT1750 | ------------------------------ Combined Crystalised Medical Memories + Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Medical Knowledge" "267727" Skills: | CH1750 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Medical Knowledge + Inert Knowledge Crystal = #L "Medical Knowledge Crystal" "267738" Skills: | CH1750 | ------------------------------ Part 3: Crystalised Memories of a Technician + Crystalised Memories of a Mechanic = #L "Combined Crystalised Technical Memories" "267702" Skills: | NP1875 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge + Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge" "267680" Skills: | PT1750 | ------------------------------ Combined Crystalised Technical Memories + Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Technical Knowledge" "267703" Skills: | NP1875 | ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Technical Knowledge + Inert Knowledge Crystal = #L "Technical Knowledge Crystal" "267740" Skills: | CH1750 | ------------------------------ Next we combine the Knowledge Crystals: Combat Knowledge Crystal + Medical Knowledge Crystal = #L "Incomplete Crystalised Memories" "267781" Skills: | QT1562 | ------------------------------ Incomplete Crystalised Memories + Technical Knowledge Crystal = #L "Complete Crystalised Memories" "267778" Skills: | QT1562 | ------------------------------ Now combine with your ready-made Bracer: Complete Crystalised Memories + Modified Ancient Combat Bracer = #L "Masterpiece Ancient Defensive Bracer" "267798" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Amazingly similar to #L "Masterpiece Ancient Defensive Bracer" "/tell recipebot show me 595" recipe :P
